inn1.comm: he bowls a length delivery on off that straightens a touch, Smith defends it off the back foot
he tucks this short of length delivery down to fine leg to get off the mark
good bounce from a length, the batsman leaves it on the angle

loud appeal for a caught behind, Steve Davis says no! Pakistan think about reviewing it but decide against it. There was a noise as the ball passed the bat. The batsman was beaten by a peach as he tried to defend the delivery from the crease
now that has shaken him up a touch, he tries to whack it over midwicket with an open stance, misses and the ball goes over the stumps
length delivery just outside off, left alone this time
he pushes this one on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
again drifting towards off stump from round the wicket, the batsman defends off the back foot
more back foot defence by Smith
slower this time, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the pitch
shorter and quicker, that was there to hit, but Smith finds Afridi at cover point with his back foot punch
slower this time, the batsman goes on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
short of length delivery on the middle and leg, good bounce on that one, the batsman tried to leave that, but the ball follows him and hits him on the shoulder
it's short and it's not too quick, Charles pulls it through midwicket for the first boundary
good sharp delivery from back of length, it bounces extra like it always does for Irfan, the batsman defends it towards gully awkwardly and takes a single
he hits the batsman on the thigh pad as Smith misses his clip off his hip
length delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
back of length delivery on off, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends to off
he bowls it quicker and flatter on off, pushed back to the bowler
shorter again, the batsman creates room by opening his stance and hammers it through point
slower and drifting on to the pads, the batsman is not able to get it away and gets hit high on the pads
he takes a step out of the crease, but is not to the pitch of it, defends
tries that shot that he played two balls ago, but the ball is not short this time and it beats his attempted cut
quicker and on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot
he is quick on this short one, brings his bat around this short ball at quick speed and pulls it through midwicket
short of length delivery on the pads, the batsman gets hit on the hip as he tries to nudge it fine
this is not short at all, barely a few inches short of length, but the batsman is quick on the pull and slaps it to deep midwicket
loose drive as Irfan tests Smith with a fuller length, the batsman doesn't come forward and is beaten
length delivery just outside off, this time Smith leaves it alone
back of length delivery outside off, left alone again
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
shorter and quicker on the pads, the batsman goes on the back foot and works it to deep square leg
pushed through outside off, the batsman cuts it hard, but straight to the man at gully
drifts in on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
slower, fuller and flighted, the batsman comes forward, but plays a touch outside the line, gets an inside edge to the leg side
he takes a small stride forward and defends this one to off
good back of length delivery on the hips, the batsman gets hit on the waist and they run as the ball goes to the left of the keeper
full delivery on the pads, Smith gets an inside edge towards fine leg but the batsmen are quick to come back for a couple
what a waste! He could have fallen to Hafeez a fifth time instead! He tries to pull a not-so-short delivery unnecessarily and gets beaten by the bounce. Nice healthy edge into the hands of the keeper
length delivery outside off, the batsman covers the line of the stumps and leaves it alone
back of length delivery on off, he shuffles on the back foot and defends it to midwicket
he plays this back of length delivery from the crease, and gets an outside edge past second slip to third man
pushed through on off, the batsman punches it to long on
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman defends it to cover
quicker and on the pads, easily nudged backward of square on the leg side
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman goes on the back foot and punches it to midiwcket
pushed through on the leg stump line, defended to the leg side
he comes forward and drives this one, but straight to cover
he bowls a short of length delivery on the stumps, Bravo hops and tucks this one to backward short leg fielder
this time he defends a similar delivery towards midwicket
length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone, the keeper takes it in front of his face
another delivery outside off, left alone again
be pushes the length up this time, the batsman stays on the back foot as he leaves that one, he was not ready for that length
he goes back to short of length stuff, Bravo defends it to cover off the back foot
flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman defends it to midwicket
he skips down the track and punches this one beautifully though cover. Haris chases, but is beaten to the boundary
hesitation! The batsman drove that to midwicket, but Lil Bravo was halfway down, comes back in time
he moves away to the leg side very early and slaps the length delivery over extra cover, couple of bounces to the boundary
now he jumps out of the crease and drives the full delivery firmly to Misbah at midwicket
shorter delivery towards leg side, Charles tries to pull it to the leg, misses, gets hit on the thighs and this beats the keeper and the slip fielder
he starts off with a full delivery which is driven to the right of the cover fielder, Misbah slides and makes a good stop, but can't prevent the single
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
loud appeal for lbw, but that surely pitched outside leg and hit the batsman high on the thigh pad
he whips the length delivery to the right of midwicket for a single
he waits on the back foot and pushes the short of length delivery to cover point
more back of length stuff from Jundaid, Lil Bravo goes on the back foot and defends it to point
he starts off from where he left, bowls a wide down the leg side
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
good length delivery just outside off, the batsman comes half forward and pushes it to cover
he stays in the crease, but drives this fuller length delivery firmly through cover. Afridi from deep point runs around and stops the boundary
he waits on the back foot and defends the short of length delivery to off
length delivery on off, easily pushed to deep cover
he bowls a short delivery to finish the over, Bravo ducks under easily
the batsman walks down the pitch and swings his bat across the line to drag it to deep square leg
length delivery on off, now Bravo takes the aggressive approach by moving his front leg out and trying to hammer it over cover, but he gets a thick outside edge over point
he bowls this slightly slower and Bravo dabs it to cover with soft hands to steal a single
he goes for a yorker from round he wicket, but it's a low full toss, the batsman slices it to point
back of length delivery angling in, the batsman comes forward and defends it to off
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to the right of midwicket for another quick single
oye! he tries to smash this length delivery across the line! It just goes over the middle stump
he waits and the crease and steers the length delivery down to third man
caught at mid-on! Wahab Riaz is thrilled with that! It was a length delivery on off and Bravo wanted to flick it towards midwicket, but he got a leading edge that lobs up for Ajmal at mid-on
good ball first up! This one is on short of length and the angle takes it past the outside edge of the bat

loud appeal for lbw! The batsman shuffled across and got hit in front of middle and leg, the only thing that could have saved him was if it pitched outside leg.. it pitched on the marginally on the line of stumps, the decision would have stayed had they reviewed
a big no-ball this time, it's short and down the leg side, and Charles slaps it fine on the leg side
he swings his bat across the line and misses the back of length ball completely.. Wahab claps at the batsman to let him know what he thought of that attempt
he bowls length and keeps it around off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it towards point this time
beautiful delivery, this one is slightly outside off, but the batsman tries to defend it from the crease and gets beaten
keeps it tight around off stump, Marlon defends it off the back foot
more back foot defence to length deliveries by Marlon
and the same again, length delivery, defended to cover point off the back foot
length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket and calls for a quick single
he bowls a half-volley on off and Samuels doesn't have to get too far forward for that, he brings the bat down firmly and drives it hard straight down the ground
length delivery on off, he pushes it softly towards mid-off and calls early for a single
length delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
he keeps it on that off stump line, the batsman defends it back down the pitch
he tries to turn the back of length delivery on the leg side, but gets hit on the thigh pad
defends close to the pads and he was well outside off, there was an appeal and Misbah went for the review but it was too late, he passed the cut off time
this was fairly straightforward! Quite plumb actually, comes round the wicket and Charles was lazy with his movements, went across and the ball dipped back in and struck him in front of the stumps
solidly defended straightaway, from over the wicket, comes back in and he gets well forward and defends
this was a quick low full toss and Gayle just about managed to get his bat down to block it
hits a good length on the off stump and he pushes it to the off side
gets across and punches it to the off side for a single
lands it outside the off stump and it moves away, he safely leaves it alone

Dropped  at first slip by Hafeez! Very good delivery honing in on the off stump, a circumspect Gayle is squared up, gets an outside edge and it goes low to slip, Hafeez was behind it but it slipped through his fingers and down to third man
stays back and defends
stays beside the line and he angles it down to third man
down the leg side and he tries to flick but misses because he shuffled a long way across
gets forward and across and he defends to the off side
Gayle's all at sea here, superb delivery by Junaid, short of a length and moved away, passed the corridor of uncertainty, beats Gayle
goes back at the crease and defends solidly
this was fuller and moving away and he leaves it alone
bends his back this time and so does Gayle as he evades that bouncer, down the leg side but no wide called
ends the over with another bouncer, Junaid not giving Gayle any freebies
gives him a bit of width and he reaches out and punches it to the off side
another Samuels special, stand and deliver, pitched up outside off and he bends his knee slightly and punches it off the meat of the bat wide of mid-off, head position and balance perfect
stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
good running, drops it with soft hands to the off side and calls quickly, WI need more singles like this
slices it towards point and tells his partner to wait
stays back at the crease and pushes it towards mid-off
sharp bounce again, really fizzy bouncer because it wasn't far from Gayle's helmet, he moved away just in time
finds the gap, stays back at the crease and slices it past cover and it nearly goes all the way yo the rope
outside off and Gayle shoulders arms, still didn't look convincing though
fuller delivery and Gayle defends to Misbah at cover
stays back at the crease to a short one and dabs it wide of second slip
comes round the wicket, extra bounce and gets an inside edge to the pads, but Junaid doesn't spot that and appeals for an lbw
close call for Gayle as he chops it onto his pads
stays forward and drives to cover
stays back and clips it towards midwicket
tossed up and Samuels drives on the up towards long-on
quicker delivery this time and Gayle is forward to defend
little slower and he plonks forward and defends
starts off with a quick one and he comes forward and defends
fuller and he comes forward and defends
gets positive this time and he chips down the track and drives, Afridi deflects it to the on side
comes round the wicket, he comes forward and defends
tossed up and he clips this towards midwicket
uses his feet once again but he pushes it straight to cover
pauses before delivery, Gayle clips this to square leg
comes forward and drives on the up to cover
on the pads and he works it to midwicket
whacks a full toss, he plays across the line and hammers it wide of long-on
slower through the air and he comes forward and defends
flatter and quicker and Gayle is forward to defend
chips down the track and he pushes it down the track
short and wide and cut away hard and Shehzad does well at backward point to stop it
full on the pads and he works it to short fine leg
tosses it wide down the leg side
flatter and fuller and defended on the front foot
fullish on the pads and he clips it straight to midwicket
gives him width and he gets forward and slices it towards third man, Ajmal cuts it off
pitches it short and he skids it through, he works it hard to midwicket
drifts on the pads and he clips it in the gap past square leg and short fine leg, Afridi chases
works it to the on side
flatter delivery and he drives on the up towards long-on
Gayle gaining in confidence, down the leg side and Gayle gets down on his knee early and slogs him behind square on the on side
stays forward and pushes it to the off side
Samuels plays that with intent, uses his feet again to Afridi, doesn't mind hitting against the turn, picks it from outside off and lofts over deep midwicket
flatter delivery and driven to long-off
down the leg side and he mistimes the sweep
Gayle too looking dangerous, tossed up by Afridi outside off and Gayle comes forward and lofts over wide long-on
cuts back at the pads and Gayle defends but it's pad first, outside the line of off, they appeal
drilled down the track and the bowler deflects it to the on side
starts off with a quicker one, he punches it down the track
sharp turn and he goes back and chops it to the off side, 50 stand up
quicker one and Gayle comes forward and pushes it to the off side
beaten! Slight turn, skids and beats the outside edge
gets forward and stabs it back to the bowler
turns it wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up and Gayle whips it flat and hard down to long-on, one bounce to the  four
another confident hit, chips down the track and whips it against the turn and finds the deep midwicket rope
close call for him as he chips down the track and is beaten, drags his feet back in time
stays back and cuts to point
width and he chops it wide of backward point
Pakistan needed this! Gayle gives it away, tossed up on middle and off and Gayle tries to clear the rope like he did in Afridi's last over, this was hit flat to Umar Amin at long-on
stays back and he works it to square leg, he ambles out of the crease, tells his partner to stay back and then realises he too has to hurry, dives and makes it to the crease
works it to the on side
stays back and defends
gets forward and gets an outside edge wide of slip
stays back and punches it late wide of slip and down to third man
rotating the strike here, punches it square on the off side and sets off
fires it in quick and he drives straight to cover
fulllish on the pads and he clips it down to midwicket
plonks for ward and defends
....and Akmal was right! Afridi errs by giving width, Simmons stays back and cuts this well wide of point and short third man
pushes it to the on side
drives firmly back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it wide of point
slower through the air and he gets forward and defends
flatter delivery and he plonks forward and defends
tossed up wide outside off, opportunity to cut, he misses out
tossed up on the pads and he clips it to the on side
bang! Samuels continues to pick on Afridi, chips down the track and hammers it along the ground to the straight boundary
slower delivery and he gets forward and checks his shot
Samuels comes down the track and the bowler hammers it short on seeing him, Samuels has to defend
drops it short and he pulls wide of square leg
dabs it wide of short third man, Samuels has to hurry
man in form! Tossed up and he comes down the track and lofts over the sight screen
tries to paddle it down to fine leg
makes room and he checks his shot and defends
flat down the leg side and he gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
flatter delivery and he comes forward and defends
shorter one and he punches it straight to cover
punches it in the gap at point for an easy single
bowls this one wide outside off, Samuels leaves it alone
this is a good one, he bowls it short of length and gets good bounce. This one also goes further away from the batsman, who is hopping on the crease and is beaten
another angled delivery that beats the bat as Marlon tries to run it down to third man
back of length delivery on off, defended to point off the back foot
this one is on the stumps, the batsman gets up on his toes and nudges it towards deep midwicket
now Simmons hops on his toes and pushes the back of length delivery towards cover for a single
he punches the offspinning delivery to mid-off and calls for a quick single
he goes on the back foot, but this one turns in sharply and he gets an inside edge to backward square leg
goes back and tucks it to point for a single
tries to clip the ball to leg side with the turn, but is beaten by the bounce and gets hit on the thigh pad
he comes forward and pushes it to cover
this one spins into the batsman sharply again and Samuels can only push it to cover
oh smartly played! He goes back and across towards the off side and pulls the ball from outside off to deep backward square leg for a couple
this time he clears his front leg out and whacks the length delivery to the deep midwicket boundary
he comes forward and punches the length delivery to cover
goes on the back foot this time and guides the angled delivery to third man
he walks across to the off side, but Irfan bowls it wider and beats the outside edge
nicely played! He arches back and guides the back of length delivery past backward point for a couple
he waits and dabs the flatter delivery towards backward square leg for a single
he keeps it on  a length and Marlon turns it to deep square leg to bring up his half-century, an innings completely in contrast with his previous effort

tossed up and full, the batsman tries to drive it inside out, but misses it completely. The ball misses the leg stump too, but that could have been a stumping chance as well had Umar Akmal taken it cleanly. A hard take it would have been though as it was full delivery
this time he whips it to deep square leg for a single
he doesn't get hold of that lofted shot, but that gives him a couple. He jumped out of the crease and wanted to go straight, but that went over extra cover
he comes forward and dabs it in front to take a quick single
he bowls a steepler around chest high from short of length, the batsman sways away from the line very late
length delivery on off, Marlon shuffles on the crease and tries to go over extra cover, but slices it over point.. He is lucky as that lands in no-man's land
clears his front leg out and tries to blast this through off, but doesn't get any timing as he pushes it to cover
again, tries to flat-bat it down the ground by clearing his front leg out, but finds the fielder at mid-on
he attempts what he tries in the previous delivery, but gets a solid result from this.. Whacks it over wide long on and comfortably over the boundary
he moves outside leg and as Irfan bowls it slightly wide, he guides it wide of the third man fielder
shorter and outside off, the batsman punches it straight to cover
tossed up and slower, the batsman comes forward and defends
quicker delivery follows, the batsman dabs it towards point and takes off for a quick one
flatter delivery, the batsman goes on the back foot and turns it to square leg
on the pads and Simmons tucks it straight to short fine leg
loopy and slow on the middle and leg line, doesn't bounce much, but Simmons tucks it towards square leg  easily
almost gets a wicket as the batsman charges out to thump the length ball over the infield, but gets a thick outside edge, which falls just short of third man
the batsman shapes to whack it to leg side, but Wahab overcorrects and bowls a wild wide outside off
tries bowling a slower delivery this time, but the result is the same, it's a wide outside off
now he finds his line, bowls length around off stump, but that is exactly what the batsman wanted too. Riaz gets spanked to deep midwicket boundary
this time he bowls a good yorker outside off, Marlon is not able to connect. That was a good ball
tries to do it again, but bowls a juicy full toss wide outside off, he is lucky that the batsman is only able to punch it to deep cover
he has bowled two wides on the off, now he goes towards the leg side with an attempted slower ball
length delivery outside off, Simmons waits in the crease and runs it down to third man
goes for a yorker, but this is a low full toss. Samuels takes the toll as he crunches it through extra cover
he charges down the track, but gets beaten by the length and pushes it to the bowler
he goes on the back foot and punches it hard straight down the ground to pick up a couple
comes down the track again and this time he is under the ball properly! This one is into the stands over deep midwicket, collision in the crowd as two guys go for a one-hander
quicker and flatter this time and he rocks back and slaps it all along the ground to the extra cover boundary
slower and on the pads, the batsman goes back and tucks it towards midwicket for a single
bowls the doosra on leg stump, easily tucked behind square on the leg side for a single
he fires it full on the middle and leg line, the batsman digs it out but doesn't know where it is. Non-striker calls for the single as the ball is right next to the stumps
aims it on the leg stump again, but this one goes a little further down the leg side
this is full outside off, Simmons tries to push it to off, but hits it to long on off the inside half of his bat
oh super yorker! Samuels gets his toe out of the line but slips and is down on the floor
and another one, the batsman squeezes it out to cover for a single this time
he takes a couple steps down expecting a fuller delivery and whips it to deep backward square leg boundary
short ball this time, catches Simmons by surprise but he somehow manages to get out of the way
he bowls it slow and on the pads, easily pushed to deep midwicket
this time he fires a low full toss on the pads and the batsman flicks it powerfully to the deep square leg boundary
shorter and outside off, he cuts it hard, but straight to the man at backward point
slower delivery down the leg side, the batsman wanted to smash it behind square, but doesn't make contact. The umpire doesn't give it a wide
quicker one outside off, the batsman tries to punch it through extra cover off the back foot, but that one comes a touch slow off the pitch, and the batsman chops it on. No show of emotion from Ajmal
he defends the first ball solidly off the back foot
nasty short delivery from Junaid, it hits the batsman on the chest as it follows him. Marlon was probably expecting the yorker, he tried to sway away but that pinged him
fuller delivery this time, the batsman drives it firmly to long-off
another short ball, Sammy ducks under it just in time
and another short delivery, but this one goes down the leg side
short ball again, Sammy gets the crowd on its feet with a powerful pull over deep midwicket, avoids falling on the stumps as he was losing balance
full delivery on the stumps, he flicks this one to loud cheers down to deep backward square leg
back of length slower delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to point for a single
he bowls a filthy short ball down the leg stump, Sammy could have left it for a wide, but he slaps it to fine leg boundary for fun
shorter and quicker on off, the batsman punches it to extra cover for a single
bowls a slow doosra, the batsman watches it carefully and defends
pushed through outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to short third man
he bowls the doosra on the leg stump, Sammy gets a leading edge that teases Ajmal, but he is not able to get to it
he comes forward and dabs it towards short third man
tries to bowl a Junaid-like yorker, but ends up bowling a Wahab-like full toss which is sliced away to the point boundary
bowls length outside off, Samuels is not able to get it away, hits it straight to cover
this one was a good yorker, but was slightly down the leg and Marlon smartly gets inside the line and flicks it fine on the leg side
good yorker, this time outside off, not much the batsman can do with it. He digs it out towards extra cover
the crowd has gone quiet! Irfan bowls short of length delivery just outside off, which Sammy tries to play a horizontal bat short of, but he gets an under edge and on to the stumps
and he is beaten outside off with a length delivery as he tries to run it down to third man
he bowls a short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman stays on the back foot and slaps it to deep midwicket
he bowls a slower ball that follows the batsman outside leg stump, Bravo dabs it to cover for a single
he gets a good yorker and that misses the leg stump only by a whisker
another quick length ball, the batsman wanted to heave it to the leg side, but he gets an under edge to the keeper
it was a good yorker, but Junaid has overstepped. The batsmen could have changed ends as the ball was pushed to long-on, but Samuels stays back
he gets this low full toss in his arc, but this one just drops short of the deep midwicket fielder
oh this one is way down the leg side, Umar Akmal does well to get a hand to it and parry it to short fine leg
he bowls a full delivery on the stumps, the batsman digs it out to long on and calls for two immediately. They make it well in time
he bowls a length delivery that is hit over the mid-off fielder easily
bowls it slightly slower and on back of length on off, the batsman tucks it to midwicket for a single
he makes room and drives it powerfully eyeing that deep extra cover region, but Misbah dives and saves a certain boundary

he is out at the non-striker's end as he tries to steal a bye! It was a nasty short ball outside off, it went past Bravo's face. Samuels charged down to get to the other end and Bravo tried that to, but was comfortably short

he gets to his sixth century! He is ecstatic! He pumps his chest. That was a short of length delivery and he slapped it for a couple of runs to wide long-on.. Excellent and powerful innings, he bowls to the crowd and to his team-mates
now he sends Big Irfan over deep midwicket with another powerful swat of a short of length delivery. What a way to end!

inn2.comm: they're off and running, picks a full delivery outside off and he clips it to midwicket
confidently punched, this was a fraction too  short and wide and Shehzad punched it wide of cover
bowls a better line, just outside off and the batsman is happy to leave it alone
hits a good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends
showing some positive intent there, short on the body and he swivels and pulls straight to fine leg
this was far too wide outside off, Jamshed tried chasing it but the angle took it further away
gets a better angle across the left-hander and safely left alone
drifts on the body and he goes back and safely tucks it down to deep square leg
this was a touch wide outside the off stump and he slices it wide of backward point
gets it closer to the batsman and he punches it down to backward point
good length outside off and he stays back and defends to the off side
fuller in length outside off and he goes back and punches it to the off side
fuller delivery and driven straight to mid-off
just drops short at square leg, Jamshed flicked it on the up and it dipped towards Simmons who couldn't get his fingers under it
drifts on the body and he works it wide of midwicket for a couple
angles it across him and bowls it fuller and he pushes it down to cover
this was angling wide across him and he flashed at it, well wide of second slip
well played, this was a half volley outside off and he went forward and didn't push at it too hard, timed well and placed wide of cover
holds the length back and shapes it away from the right-hander, left alone
tucks him up for room and he punches it down the track
this was shorter and Jamshed had to rock back quickly for the pull to fine leg, looked a bit awkward
spears it towards the stumps and Shehzad pushes it past the gap at cover, another confident start
good length around the off stump and he works it back to the bowler
gets away with a full delivery, he didn't place it well enough and couldn't beat cover
he stays beside the line and angles it straight to Simmons at backward point

He has been given out lbw and Shehzad wants to review it, lands a shade outside off and comes in with the angle, Shehzad doesn't cover the line, ball misses the bat and hits the flap of the back leg, no inside edge, Hawkeye shows that hitting the stumps so the decision stays
Hafeez gets a snorter straightaway, short one aiming at the face, he fends it off the glove and the ball lobs and lands safe on the off side
drifts on the body and he shuffles and tucks it to square leg
that's a half volley outside off, Jamshed leans forward and pierces the gap at cover, Sammy chases
that's a better one, he lands it on the blockhole and he digs it out
angles it outside the off stump and he tucks it to the on side
Hafeez finds his rhythm early, this was a short one from Roach, Hafeez appeared to pick the length early and pulled it wide of square leg
fuller in length and on the stumps and he works it wide of midwicket, slight fumble
stays beside the line and chops it towards backward point
Jamshed got lucky there, he was cramped for room as he looked to cut, ended up chopping it down hard on the pitch and the ball bounced high enough to comfortably clear the keeper
stays back and knocks it to the on side
Hafeez gaining in confidence, this was a half volley on middle and leg, he offers the full face of the bat and a defensive push is enough to beat mid-on, used the pace on the ball
fullish outside off and pushed towards mid-on
drifts on the body and he works it behind square on the on side
that's another freebie, Holder drifts on the body, angle takes it down leg and Hafeez helps it down to fine leg
almost a run-out! Hafeez worked it down to midwicket, Jamshed took off and had to scamper back, Sammy's aim was just off the mark at the bowler's end
good length on the body and he works it to the on side
Holder was lucky to get away with this, half volley on the pads and Hafeez could only clip it off his pads to the keeper
this was short and he swivels and pulls in front of square, didn't time it as well and the ball is pulled back before the rope at deep midwicket
stays beside the line and he pushes it wide of cover
good delivery by Roach, quick one on the blockhole and he squirts it out to the on side
sliced him in half! Comes in sharply with the angle, Hafeez doesn't move his feet much and the ball sneaks between bat and body
he stays back at the crease and softly punches it to the off side
angles it towards middle and leg and he works it straight to short midwicket
outside off and he punches it to the off side
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends to the off side
round the wicket to the right-hander and this troubles Hafeez, bounces more and he fends it off
fullish outside off and defended to the off side
full on off stump and driven to mid-on
fullish outside off and angled towards point
sharp bouncer from Roach, gaining on Hafeez who arches back to evade it
short of a length on the body and he hops and knocks it to square leg
fuller and angling on the off stump and Hafeez gets nicely behind the line to defend
fullish delivery on the stumps and he pushes it down to mid-off
keeps it nice and tight on the stumps and he knocks it to the on side
stays back at the crease and stabs it to mid-off and sets off but changes his mind
gave him a bit of width to drive but he mistimed it back to the bowler
shorter and he goes back and flicks it to the leg side but can't beat square leg
stays back and knocks it back to the bowler
gives him width, Jamshed stays back and times the punch well past cover, Roach patrols the rope and just about picks it up
gets forward and drives towards extra cover
keeps it straight and he softly punches it down the track
stays back at the crease and softly punches it back to the bowler
gives him a bit of width this time, he stays back and chops it wide of point
short again and outside off, fetches it from outside off and pulled to midwicket
times the punch well off the back foot and backward point has to chase that
Hafeez shuffles across the crease early before delivery, pushes it in front of mid-off and sets off, there;s a direct hit at the striker's end and Jamshed is home
tossed up outside off and full and he drives him wide of cover
full on the pads and he knocks it down to the wide open spaces on the on side
waits for it and flicks it late to square leg
that was full and wide outside off and he drives him straight to cover
goes back and flicks it to the on side and calls immediately
quicker one from Narine and safely defended
good length on the pads and he works it away wide of square leg
moves across his stumps and tries to slice it wide of point, can't beat the fielder
this was short outside off and Jamshed fetched it but failed to place it wide of mid-on, should have put that away
fuller and angling across and he slices it wide of point, Holder picks up at third man
turns the bat and works it away easily past square leg
little short and he mistimes the pull wide of square leg
stays back and knocks it down the track

terrible mixup! Jamshed has to go, Hafeez went forward and knocked it softly towards cover and appeared to set off for the run, Jamshed charged away from the other end and it looked like Hafeez sold him down the river, Jamshed had to scamper back but it was too late as the fielder threw it to Narine, Jamshed had no chance
good length on the pads and he works it away down to deep square leg
punches it to the off side for a single
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
plonks forward and defends again
good length on the pads and he knocks it to the on side
worked away off the pads and well stopped by Samuels at midwicket, saved an extra run
cramps him for room and he punches it down to cover
stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
worked towards square leg and there's a direct hit at the bowler's end, Hafeez wants to run off the deflection but Misbah sends him back, Pakistan don't need another mixup!
cuts it down to backward point and it's drinks
flighted and full on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he goes for a reverse paddle, but the ball is not full enough and he is lucky as the ball drops away from the keeper and the slip fielder after lobbing off his gloves
he comes forward and defends it to the leg side
- waits in the crease and tucks it to short fine leg for a single
he waits and opens the face of the bat to run it down to short third man
it's outside off, but Misbah paddles it fine for a single
he starts off with a very short delivery that sails way over the batsman's head
bowls a slower delivery this time, it is turned to backward square leg for a single
another slower ball wide outside off, the batsman waits and waits, then slashes at it, but makes no connection
another slower delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
quicker one this time. But it was short and wide outside off, Misbah misses out as he is beaten for pace
slower ball this time, the batsman steers it down to third man
another slower delivery outside off, now Misbah guides it to third man
he fires this one on the pads and all the batsman has to do is to get some bat on it, this one speeds to the fine leg boundary
shorter and flatter on off, the batsman tucks it to midwicket for a quick single
he makes room and crashes the shorter delivery to deep point
fuller outside off, the batsman takes full toll of this one, crunches it all along the ground to the extra cover boundary
he waits for this one and chops it to short third man for a quick single

another quicker one, Hafeez pushes it to deep point off the back foot for an easy single, but there is a stupid overthrow and Pakistan steal a single. Wait, there is almost another one as the deep midwicket fielder fires on on the non-striker's end with the bowler not around
full and on the pads, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg
slower delivery wide outside off, Prof drives it powerfully, but Gayle makes a good diving save at the cover
slower delivery on the stumps, Misbah pushes it to deep midwicket
he is quick to swivel on his back foot and slap this short delivery, but he finds the man at deep midwicket
back of length delivery just outside off, Misbah chops it to third man
he tries to whack the slower delivery through off, but gets an inside edge back down the pitch
he nudges the short of length delivery towards square leg with soft hands and looks for a couple, but settles for a single in the end
he moves outside leg, but Holder follows him and cramps him for room. Prof manages to tuck it behind square
short of length delivery outside off, Misbah pulls and doesn't pull well, it goes as far as midwicket. But the fielder is on the boundary
he targets the batsman with a short one, but this goes down the leg side
he makes room, but gets a short ball coming in to him, so he swivels and sends this soaring over the deep backward square leg fielder. It's the breeze that takes it over the fielder, the locals say
now a no-ball as he bowls a beamer at the batsman. Hafeez manages to turn it to short fine
length delivery on the pads, pushed down the ground to long on
another short ball, and again, Prof helps it along the breeze with a powerful hit to the deep backward square leg boundary
fires a low full toss on the pads, Misbah whips it to deep midwicket for couple of runs
he shuffles across to a back of length delivery outside off, then opens the face to run it down fine on the off side
length delivery on off, Prof slaps it across the line to deep midwicket
slower delivery outside off, Misbah smartly drags it towards cow corner with soft hands and charges back for the second
full and wide outside off, all Misbah does is he pushes it through the infield. And look at them running, they take three as Gayle was a bit slow behind the ball
lovely cover drive! Prof brings up his half-century with a well timed drive through covers, there was no one in deep to stop that one
full delivery on the off stump, Misbah sweeps it to the right of deep backward square leg
flighted delivery outside off, Prof waits and cuts it to deep backward point
this one is pushed outside off, Misbah was ready for his reverse sweep, but it kept going away, he is beaten
full delivery closer to the stumps, it's pushed down to long on
he makes a lot of room early and then guides the quicker delivery to short third man for a quick single
full and flighted outside off, but Misbah sweeps it powerfully to deep midwicket
he goes for a yorker, but it's a low full toss that is driven down to long-on
again goes for a full delivery, but this is a knee-high full-toss now, and Prof punches it past midwicket sweetly. Sammy makes a valiant effort on his home turf, the ball just gets away

caught at backward point! Oh wow, Darren Bravo has given a little life to the home team here!It was length delivery outside off and Prof really got stuck into that, but Lil Bravo takes a low stinger. Hafeez has to go back after a good hand
he gets a beautiful delivery first up and is comprehensively beaten. It angled in, pitched on short of length and Afridi went for a poke at it
how far was that from Lil Bravo! It was short and wide and Lala crashed it, but that flies from just the left hand side of Lil Bravo
short of length delivery outside off, Afridi guides it to third man
he fires it full on off, Afridi drives it to long off easily
oh Misbah! how well was that timed! It is full half-volley on his off stump and Misbah drives it, opens the face slightly to place it in the gap at extra cover and that flies to the boundary
pushed through down the leg side, but it's not called a wide, because Misbah was standing way down the leg side
he dabs it to short third man to pick up a quick single
quicker length ball on the pads, Afridi calmly nudges it to square leg for a single
he moves way down the leg side, the bowler fires it on his pads, he then moves inside the line and looks at the umpire for a wide. The umpire says no
he bowls a sharp short ball at Afridi, but the batsman ducks under it
oh oo! Short ball, Afridi flat bats it looking to send it to the sea, but he slaps it straight to the man at deep midwicket. Not to his left, not to his right, straight to the fielder
had that hit, Umar Akmal would have been run out at non-striker's, but since there was noone backing up, he got an overthrow. It was Lil Bravo who threw that from point
he bowls a good yorker that is dug out back down the pitch
lovely timing by Umar! It was a fuller length delivery wide outside off and he threads the gap behind square on off with precision.. Flies past Lil Bravo at backward point
slower delivery now, Umar drops it towards cover with soft hands and calls for a single
full delivery outside off, Umar drags it to deep midwicket with a heave
he bowls a knee-high full-toss this time, Misbah calmly nudges it to deep midwicket
he fires this on the block hole, but Umar gets under it and chips it towards deep midwicket
flatter and slower this time on the pads, Misbah pushes it to deep midwicket again
another yorker, now Umar Akmal goes straight with his chip shot to long-on
quicker delivery on the pads, Misbah tucks it to deep backward square leg for a single
he bowls a low full-toss, Misbah flicks it to deep square leg
he bowls a yorker on leg stump, Umar makes room and digs it out to mid-off
oh this was beautifully pinged back down the ground, but Misbah hits Umar at non-striker's. And he is not happy with Umar for not being able to get out of the way in time
fired into the block hole, Umar pushes that to long-on

oye! Now Misbah has hit the umpire! This was a low full-toss and Misbah pings it back again, it was a drop by Bravo, but that came back too quickly and hit Steve Davis on his bottoms. Davis apologises for stopping that one
full delivery, Umar digs it out down the ground for a single
he bowls the other one on the leg stump line, but Umar is on the back foot and he slaps it to deep midwicket easily
quicker delivery on off, Misbah wanted to hoick it towards cow corner, but he gets an inside edge to deep backward square leg
full delivery on the pads, thumped really hard, but straight to the deep midwicket fielder
now Narine fires in a yorker, 113 kph, Umar can only block it out as far as midwicket
he gets to his half-century with a thundering slap over deep midwicket. It was slow and short and asked to be hit, but that was butchered
fires in a quicker one, the batsman can only dig it out back to the bowler
he bowls a high full-toss and Umar Akmal makes room and whacks it over the bowler's head for a boundary
now he gets a low full toss and this time he drives it powerfully down the ground. Sammy dived in vain
and no. 3 in the over, Bravo wants to finish this himself. It was length outside off and Umar Akmal carves it over point for a one-bounce four
he takes a couple of steps down and then chips the short of length delivery over cover for a couple of runs to make the scores level
full delivery on the pads, it is driven powerfully towards the deep midwicket boundary, but Simmons makes a good stop at midwicket
it's all over! Misbah has done it! They let out a cry of happiness as they steal a single off a yorker
